<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hymn of Healing](/Feats.aspx?ID=4574) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 101 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You learn the [_hymn of healing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1768) composition spell, which imbues your music with rich melodies that help your allies recover from harm.
name: Hymn of Healing
